name: POTION RUSH (noonyeyz)
description:
Potion Rush is a game where players compete to collect falling items to get a better score! Some items can damage your score though so be careful and avoid those. Get as many points as you can before the times runs out!

Environment Artist / Katie Richard / @Silexiunno

3D Animator/Rigger / Mika Oezeozen

Programmer / Bryan Le

Character Pixel Artist / Sam Nunez / @noonyeyz
